data.text:
Presentation on theme: "Www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria FH JOANNEUM UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES Europe – Austria – Styria STUDY YOUR."— Presentation transcript:

1 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria FH JOANNEUM UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES Europe – Austria – Styria STUDY YOUR DREAM.

2 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria

3 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Trennseite Calibri 40 pkt FH JOANNEUM IN Bewegung Auszeichnungen Georgia 24 pkt

4 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Graz – Science and culture Population 260,000 Student population 50,000 8 universities City of Design UNESCO World Cultural Heritage Site Business and Innovation Centre

5 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Kapfenberg – High Tech and Sports Home to many high-tech companies World-class sports centre State-of-the-art laboratories “Kapfenberg is a great place to study – high quality education and research, a friendly, informal atmosphere, supportive lecturers and fellow students as well as excellent sports facilities”, Sebastian Marchler, student.

6 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Bad Gleichenberg – Health and Tourism Located in the spa region of Eastern Styria Health resort with a long tradition Regional strengths: tourism, wellness, health & eco-technology

7 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Milestones 1995 FH JOANNEUM launches its first four degree programmes: Industrial Design and Construction Engineering and Management in Graz, Industrial Management and Electronic Engineering in Kapfenberg. 2001 The Bad Gleichenberg campus opens with the degree programme in Health Management in Tourism. 2003 First degree programmes are converted to the bachelor/master system in accordance with the Bologna guidelines. 2006 The courses for allied health professions are converted into FH degree programmes. This means the start of a range of Health Sciences degree programmes. 2007 FH JOANNEUM receives the status of University of Applied Sciences with a Rector responsible for its scientific strategy and organisation. 2013/14 FH JOANNEUM has 41 degree programmes in six departments with over 3800 students and employs some 540 staff.

8 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Imagefilm

10 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria 8,666 graduates Development of number of graduates as of 15/11 Diploma degree programmes Master degree programmes Bachelor degree programmes

28 www.fh-joanneum.at Styria | Austria Study @ FH JOANNEUM More than 200 partner universities all over the world International Relations: Orientation Programme German as a Foreign Language Numerous intercultural events Student projects Excellent results at competitions and evaluations Global Business Programme

29 www.fh-joanneum.at Mission statement We are one of Austria's leading Universities of Applied Sciences. In order to maintain and consolidate this status, both our teaching and our applied research and development is modelled on the best colleges and universities in Europe.
